name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>奥<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>義<rt>ぎ</rt></ruby>－<ruby>一<rt>いっ</rt></ruby><ruby>式<rt>しき</rt></ruby><ruby>攻<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>事<rt>じ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack.

effect.en: Shuffle up to 6 Wyrm Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck. Then, if [the total Levels of the monsters shuffled by this effect] is 16 or higher, you can destroy all Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field.
